ComicInfo.Summary:
For the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition card stock cover of THE GOON #10 with art by Simone D'Armini (The Spider King)! Witches... Fish Men... and Beer! It's a calamitous mixture as the Goon and Franky try to keep the Brewer's Union in line and chaos from erupting in the streets.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Eric Powell | 1 | Var | Cardstock Variant Cover | Simone D'Armini | 2 |
